definitions: To cover someone or something entirely with a soft mass of something.
To kill (someone) by covering their face so that they cannot breathe.
To suppress or hold back (a feeling or a reaction).
To extinguish (a fire) by covering it with something.
To be overcome with or as if with a lack of air.
examples: She tried to smother the baby with a pillow.
The cake was smothered in cream.
I felt smothered by all the attention.
